name: Bloons Shooter 1
description: Try to survive the onslaught of bloons as a supermonkey. See how many bloons you can pop or how long you will survive. WASD keys to move and use your mouse to aim and hold it down to shoot. Holding shift makes you faster and holding ctrl makes you slower. The slower you are the faster you will shoot. Each diffiiculty incease the bloon spawn rate.
